item.title: Introduction to Machine Learning: A Beginner's Guide
item.description: Introduction to Machine Learning: A Beginner’s Guide Machine learning is an exciting field that involves using algorithms and statistical models to enable computer systems to learn from data and improve their performance on a specific task over time. It is a subfield of artificial intelligence (AI) and has many applications in areas such as image recognition, speech recognition, natural language processing, and autonomous driving. If you’re new to machine learning and want to get started, this beginner’s guide will provide you with a comprehensive introduction to the field.
